verses.text: \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* scroll \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* ordinary \f + \fr 8:1 \ft Hebrew with a man’s\f* stylus: \w Maher-shalal-hash-baz|strong="H4122"\w*.\f + \fr 8:1 \ft Maher-shalal-hash-baz means The spoil speeds, the prey hastens or Swift to plunder, quick to carry away; also in verse 3.\f*

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* appoint \w for|strong="H1121"\w* Myself trustworthy \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*—Uriah \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jeberekiah.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* relations \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w The|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Name|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Maher-shalal-hash-baz|strong="H4122"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* ‘Father’ \w or|strong="H4428"\w* ‘Mother,’ \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria.”
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w further|strong="H5750"\w*:

“\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gently \w flowing|strong="H1980"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shiloah|strong="H7975"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* rejoiced \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Rezin|strong="H7526"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Remaliah|strong="H7425"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* \w floodwaters|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w* \f + \fr 8:7 \ft Hebrew the River\f*— \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* pomp. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* overflow \w its|strong="H3605"\w* channels \w and|strong="H1980"\w* overrun \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w banks|strong="H1415"\w*.

\w It|strong="H4393"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* pour \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, swirling \w and|strong="H3063"\w* sweeping \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w*, \w reaching|strong="H5060"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*; \w its|strong="H1961"\w* spreading streams \w will|strong="H1961"\w* cover \w your|strong="H1961"\w* entire land, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Immanuel|strong="H6005"\w*!\f + \fr 8:8 \ft Immanuel means God with us.\f*

Huddle \w together|strong="H5971"\w*,\f + \fr 8:9 \ft Or Raise the war cry or Be evil or Be broken\f* \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w shattered|strong="H2865"\w*; pay attention, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w distant|strong="H4801"\w* lands; prepare \w for|strong="H3605"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w shattered|strong="H2865"\w*; prepare \w for|strong="H3605"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w shattered|strong="H2865"\w*!

\w Devise|strong="H5779"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w plan|strong="H6098"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w thwarted|strong="H6565"\w*; \w state|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w proposal|strong="H1697"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w happen|strong="H6965"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.\f + \fr 8:10 \ft Hebrew Immanuel; see Matthew 1:23.\f*” A Call to Fear God (Ecclesiastes 8:10–13)

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* spoken \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H2393"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, instructing \w me|strong="H3256"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

“\w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* call \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* regard \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*;\f + \fr 8:12 \ft Or Do not fear their threats\f* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* live \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w dread|strong="H6206"\w*.\f + \fr 8:12 \ft LXX do not be shaken; cited in 1 Peter 3:14\f*

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w One|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H4172"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w regard|strong="H6942"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*. Only \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H6206"\w*; only \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* dreaded.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*— \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w stumbling|strong="H4383"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* offense,\f + \fr 8:14 \ft Cited in Romans 9:33 and 1 Peter 2:8\f* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dwellers \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w trap|strong="H4170"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* \w over|strong="H5307"\w* these; \w they|strong="H3920"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*; \w they|strong="H3920"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* \w ensnared|strong="H3369"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w*.”

\w Bind|strong="H6887"\w* \w up|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H2856"\w* \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w* \w and|strong="H8451"\w* \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H2856"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w among|strong="H8451"\w* \w my|strong="H6887"\w* \w disciples|strong="H3928"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w hiding|strong="H5641"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 8:17 \ft Or I will eagerly look for Him; cited in Hebrews 2:13\f*

\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \f + \fr 8:18 \ft Cited in Hebrews 2:13\f* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* signs \w and|strong="H3478"\w* symbols \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwells|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*. Darkness and Light

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w tell|strong="H1897"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* spirits \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w spiritists|strong="H3049"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w whisper|strong="H6850"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w mutter|strong="H1897"\w*, shouldn’t \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w instead|strong="H3588"\w*? \w Why|strong="H3588"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H4191"\w* \w behalf|strong="H1157"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*?

\w To|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w testimony|strong="H8584"\w*! If \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* according \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H7837"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w dawn|strong="H7837"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* roam \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land, dejected \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w famished|strong="H7457"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w enraged|strong="H7107"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* God.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H5080"\w* \w will|strong="H6869"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5080"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* earth \w and|strong="H6869"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w* only \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* \w and|strong="H6869"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w* \w and|strong="H6869"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w gloom|strong="H4588"\w* \w of|strong="H5080"\w* \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w*. \w And|strong="H6869"\w* \w they|strong="H5080"\w* \w will|strong="H6869"\w* be \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* \w into|strong="H5080"\w* utter \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*.
